name: Slime Farm (pinapl)
description:
Howdy farmer, in this game you plant and harvest root veggies from veggie slimes! Try to plant and sell veggies that are high on the stock market, and keep in mind some slimes like and dislike other slimes, try to plant them strategically once you figure out their preferences. Aim for the biggest money number, yeehaw!

Disclaimer: Made this in about 12 hours, it is *very* finished and *totally* not a work in progress. Nonetheless, I hope you have fun. 

Credits to Flowerhead for the music, check him out here https://somewhatgoodroyaltyfreemusic.bandcamp.com/community

Check out the Game Jam release here! https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/slime-farm
